item.title: The Real Problem Behind GenAI Pilot 'Failures': Business Value Misalignment, Not Technology
item.description: High GenAI pilot failure rates aren’t about technology limitationsâ€”they’re about fundamental business practice failures. Here’s how proper value assessment and constituency alignment can dramatically improve success rates.
